item.title: How to mount host folder in VMware 20.04 on Windows.
item.description: This time I want to use ubuntu20.04 on VMware as my workspace. But I don’t want to move and backup my files frequently. So I need to find a way to mount my host files to virtual machine. First I need to install VMware-tools to my virtual machine. With some reasons, I can’t install it autoly( The button is grey). So use the next bash command to install it. sudo apt install open-vm-tools-desktop Then close the virtual machine.
